overview:
Luiz Carraro is a brazilian entrepreneur focused in digital business and also one of the founders of Social Adrenaline, a major social media company in Brazil.

Earlier in life, Carraro studied Computer Science with focus on Artificial Intelligence and Artificial Immune Systems. His work was then published in Japan and recognized by its innovative idea. Luiz extended his scientific knowledge by attending Mackenzie University (SP-BR) and acquiring a Master’s Degree in Electrical Engineering with special focus on Adaptative Systems Engineering.

While at Mackenzie, Luiz developed a innovative solution to optimize short-term operational planning of container terminals. His solution was internationally recognized by its optimization criteria, being published in Spain and Australia in one of the most important scientific events in computer science.

In 2011, together with old college friends from distinct areas, Luiz founded Social Adrenaline to provide brands and companies a better way to create awareness and engagement based on social media solutions.

In 2012 Luiz became a professor for Systems Information and Engineering in Paran√° (BR).
